alert.note: Alert for Flagler; St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 3:50PM EDT until June 10 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Flagler County in northeastern Florida... Southeastern St. Johns County in northeastern Florida... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 350 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crescent Beach, or 10 miles east of Hastings, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marineland, Crescent Beach, Butler Beach and Dupont Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
